title: Ep. 10 - Supply chain may spoil our holiday. Or so they say.
itunes:title: Ep. 10 - Supply chain may spoil our holiday. Or so they say.
description: There’s lots of noise and pearl clutching when it comes to whether we’ll have anything to put under the Christmas tree this year. Hogwash, says Wendy. We have an abundance of stuff and things right in our local communities, so let’s support our local crafters and bakers and candlestick makers.
